Business Scenario 2 

The following is the 824 transaction set sent from DEF Insurance to report on the implementation guide error of the 124 from JonesCo.

Errors Found in File 824 5010X186-2
* W10009:Padding, spaces or control characters detected after segment terminator.
* H10014:Leading zeros detected in OTI08. The X12 syntax requires the suppression of leading zeros for numeric elements.
* H10014:Leading zeros detected in TED0501. The X12 syntax requires the suppression of leading zeros for numeric elements.
